channel.title: Does it have the potential to succeed?

item.title: Does it have the potential to succeed?
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

Thanks for the positive comments.

Not trying to advertise here, but did i mention you get a $2 free credit if you register?
I’ve mentioned this everywhere but it seems like a lot less people registered than i thought.
I thought it was a pretty good idea…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2009, 01:47:23 pm[/size][hr]I’ve decided it needs a lot more work, mods feel free to put a lock on this one.

Read full topic
item.source: Does it have the potential to succeed?

item.title: Does it have the potential to succeed?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

That is actually a good idea, hope it goes well for you.

The website looks fine to me, but then I’ve always been bad at visual design, so what do I know?

item.title: Does it have the potential to succeed?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:9, topic:258240”][quote author=chassy13 link=topic=340996.msg2640386#msg2640386 date=1232822545]
I don’t think you would be really caring about the language if you were chatting with them…
[/quote]
The website’s purpose is to let people talk to pretty girls in the language the customer wants to learn.
Girls might reward the customer by taking off some clothes

It’s really easy to learn a language that way.[/quote]
If only they taught in school like this… I’d have learned so much!

item.title: Does it have the potential to succeed?
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

If the colorous would match, i dont think you would notice it as “a bunch of shit plastered together”
I need something i can do with the colors, i just dont quiet know what. Any suggestions?

Also, would you register on the site? Why or why not?
Tell me everything you like/dislike.

Read full topic
item.source: Does it have the potential to succeed?

item.title: Does it have the potential to succeed?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

The layout of the site is good, but the style is all fucked up. You’ve got like the apple.com website background from like 12 years ago. Like urban stuff, then like glossy stuff. You need like one theme for the entire site. It looks like you just took a bunch of shit and plastered it together. Also, way too much unused space in the header area.

Read full topic
